name: Ho Ho Fighters
description:
NOTE: Press any gamepad button on startscreen to enable it. Downloadable Windows version available below.

Keyboard 1: W, A, S, D, Left Shift or Space to throw. Keyboard 2: Arrow Keys, Right Shift or Period to throw. ESC to restart game.

Gamepads: Left Stick or D-Pad, Button 1 or Button 2 to throw.

Make snowballs by stopping on a patch of snow. Hit an opponent and you get 2 points, get hit and you lose 1 point. First to 16 points wins!

Thanks for playing! This is an early alpha build and I want your help to improve the game. Follow me, @pbergmar, on Twitter and tell me your ideas! I might add power ups and more obstacles later, actually I want to add a lot of things to this and will do so when and if I find the time.
